title: Thicker than Water
description: Not all monsters are make-believe.When a badly mutilated body washes up on the shores of Loch Ness, DCI Jack Logan's dream of a quiet life in the Highlands is shattered.While the media speculates wildly about monster attacks, Jack and the Major Investigations Team must act fast to catch the killer before they can strike again.But with Nessie-hunters descending on the area in their dozens, and an old enemy rearing his ugly head, the case could well turn out to be the most challenging of Jack's career.And, if he isn't careful, the last.Death and dark humour combine in this fast-paced Tartan Noir crime thriller set in the Highlands of Scotland.
author: J.D. Kirk
